description:
As a Sr. Sales Manager, you will be responsible for leading and managing a team of sales professionals to drive revenue growth and achieve sales targets. Your duties will include:

- Developing and implementing strategic sales plans to expand the customer base and increase market share
- Leading the sales team in identifying new business opportunities and developing relationships with key clients
- Managing key accounts and ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction
- Providing guidance and support to the sales team, including training, coaching, and performance evaluations
- Monitoring market trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop innovative solutions and drive customer success
- Utilizing Salesforce or other CRM tools to track sales activities, analyze data, and generate reports for management

```Skills```
To excel in this role, you should possess the following skills:

- Leadership: Ability to inspire and motivate a team towards achieving sales goals
- Sales: Proven track record of driving sales growth and exceeding targets
- Market Knowledge: Strong understanding of market dynamics, trends, and competition
- Business Development: Experience in identifying and pursuing new business opportunities
- Account Management: Ability to build and maintain long-term relationships with key clients
- Salesforce: Proficiency in using Salesforce or similar CRM software for sales tracking and reporting
- Technology Sales: Familiarity with selling technology products or services
- Technical Sales: Ability to understand complex technical concepts and effectively communicate them to customers
- Customer Service: Commitment to providing exceptional customer service throughout the sales process

If you are a results-driven individual with strong leadership skills and a passion for sales, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $70,083.00 - $170,912.00 per year

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance

Schedule:
• Monday to Friday
• Weekends as needed

Travel requirement:
• No travel

Ability to Relocate:
• Minneapolis, MN 55448: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person
